Day 13, done! I was actually wondering about my boat pose because it's always so uncomfortable... I finally understand why this position was a challenge for me, and now I'm doing a super easy very of the boat pose which doesn't strain my hip flexors as much... Learning every day with this practice ♥︎ With each practice I improve...
